name: Three Body Problem #007 - pendulum
description: A Pico-8 simulation of the three body problem. I am trying to find interesting patterns among the chaos. The initial conditions are randomized and not stored, so each OBJKT represents a unique instance of the simulation, now gone forever. Find the source code here https://github.com/atomoton/threebodyproblem/blob/master/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 to see any changes to the simulation or visualization code.
